meanings.definition: A unit of loudness level equal to the loudness of a 1000-hertz tone at 40 decibels above threshold
meanings.sent1: The music was so loud that it measured several sones on the scale.
meanings.sent2: The sound engineer adjusted the volume to match the desired sones.
meanings.sent3: The sones in the room were so high that even the walls seemed to vibrate.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the hall, reaching sones that startled everyone.
meanings.sent5: The sones of the thunderstorm made it feel like the sky was roaring above us.
